channel.title: How to change the ip in the 508 client?
channel.description:
Some1 please help, my 525 will just not connect, it comes up with game crashed i think it has somthing to do with the port, but i'm running another server on 43594 so i want this to be on 5555, it works when it is 43594, but that means i have to shut of my other 508 server? or change the port? if so, how? is this possible? if anyone could help and add me on msn Breeend0@hotmail.com and we could use team viewer that would be very helpfull thanks, Brendon
All i need to know now is, how to change the port in the 508 ip changer!!!

item.title: How to change the ip in the 508 client?
item.dc:creator: @red_arrow red arrow
item.description:
@red_arrow wrote:

there is no real point in posting pictures, ill try to explain again.

i try to log into my 525 when the port is 5555 and it doesnt let me connect, but if i change my port to 43594 it works, BUT! my other server is running that same port, so i was to change my 508’s server’s port to 5555, i know that is in the run.bat iv’e done that. but i need to know what file to change the port in my 508 CLIENT, like applet_sub.java or somthing

so all i need to know is how to change what port to look for in the 508 ip changer client!

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the ip in the 508 client?
item.dc:creator: @elijah101 elijah101
item.description:
@elijah101 wrote:

yes.

Go to control panel and select windows firewall :

Click exceptions -

Click add port :

What you do :

Tell me if this works :s

item.title: How to change the ip in the 508 client?
item.dc:creator: @elijah101 elijah101
item.description:
@elijah101 wrote:

If the 525 works fine on 43594, simply go to control panel go to firewall settings and go to exceptions then delete both of the port exceptions and then re-do it, making the 525 with the port 43594 and the 508 on port 5555, i don’t really know if this is what you we’re looking for but this is my best answer i can think of :s of course i really didn’t read the question =P

Read full topic
